com.whirvis.jraknet.client

Class MaximumTransferUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.whirvis.jraknet.client.MaximumTransferUnit

  • public class MaximumTransferUnit
extends java.lang.Object
    Used by the RakNetClient during login to track how and when it should modify its maximum transfer unit in the login process.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger LOG 
      private int retries 
      private int retriesLeft 
      private int size 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MaximumTransferUnit(int size, int retries)
      Constructs a MaximumTransferUnit with the maximum transfer unit and amount of retries before it should stop being used.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getRetries()
      Returns the default amount of retries before the client stops using this MaximumTransferUnit and uses the next lowest one.
      int getRetriesLeft()
      Returns the amount of times retry() can be called before yielding zero or lower without calling reset()
      int getSize()
      Returns the size of the maximum transfer unit.
      void reset()
      Sets the amount of retries left back to the default.
      int retry()
      Lowers the amount of retries left.
      static MaximumTransferUnit[] sort(MaximumTransferUnit[] units)
      Sorts an array of MaximumTransferUnit's from highest to lowest maximum transfer units.
      java.lang.String toString()

                           int retries)
        Constructs a MaximumTransferUnit with the maximum transfer unit and amount of retries before it should stop being used.

        retries - the amount of retries before it should stop being used.
